channel.title: Skiire
channel.description:
I won't be able to continue developing this.
ASWD walking Pathfinding while walking, not a real feature, just a lucky glitch. QE camera rotation Tons of gameframe changes Nearly finished swing chat module Crown/chat loading A few new packets Tons of small tweaks Custom map
I can't remember most of the updates I did to this, I never kept a log. I recommend you rip things you want rather then use this client. When I get some free-time I'll rip some more stuff from the server and post that. Client: http://uppit.com/wzjojw3i58w/Client.rar Cache: http://uppit.com/5wqmq3bwv4k/Skiire.rar Media: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qYoyXkeQ0pI That video is old, really old. The gameframe has been re-centered. Along with numerous other updates. I will not even bother to help with any errors. Ever since I first offered to help members I have gotten nothing but a shit-storm of bratty children who are too stubborn to follow a tutorial complaining for help. Enjoy. Credits: MITB Galkon Skiire Lin Anyone else who contributed towards this that I'm unaware of.

item.title: Skiire
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

Loveandpower:

Sad to see this released. Would lol in real life if somebody actually knew how to do anything with this.

MITB is one of the more advanced communities out there, in my opinion. The great programmers typically reside on the other half of the forums though. I’m more than certain someone will at least use the ideas from this, probably not the code though because of how poorly made it is.

Read full topic

[quote=“Skiire, post:7, topic:440308”][quote author=Mystic-Effect link=topic=542983.msg3979866#msg3979866 date=1335122224]
if the transparency is done the way im thinking u did it it could of done a way better way but im going to check it out.
[/quote]

I will not deny that a lot of things could or rather should have been done better. It was a learning experience and I enjoyed it nonetheless.

good job

Responded to you via pm. Thanks.

Nice concept

It’s not done, there are a lot of flaws. Orbs/interfaces aren’t even fully done, etc. Thank you though.[/quote]

Looks nice, but I can’t login with it no errors tho it just disconnects

I wouldn’t recommend using it as an actual client. Just rip from it.

EDIT:

I figured most people would be after aswd walking/chat. The gameframe looks disgusting at its current state (not finished).

ASWD walking Pathfinding while walking, not a real feature, just a lucky glitch. QE camera rotation Tons of gameframe changes Nearly finished swing chat module Crown/chat loading A few new packets Tons of small tweaks Custom map
